title.@value: Postprocedural left-sided atrioventricular valvar abnormality in double-inlet ventricle

definition.@value: A postnatal pathological change in form or function of the left-sided atrioventricular valve in double inlet ventricle that occurred during or after an intervention.

label.@value: Congenital anomaly of an atrioventricular valve or atrioventricular septum

codingNote.@value: Includes: left ventricular component and left-sided atrioventricular valve within a common atrioventricular junction (atrioventricular septal defect) in the setting of double inlet ventricle

label.@value: Postprocedural left-sided atrioventricular valvar abnormality in double-inlet ventricle
